unnormalised: Hey! Pesticide usage is a big topic, especially in states like Punjab. Remember the Green Revolution? Lots of chemicals used since then. My granddad in his village used to say, "too much is never good". Need sustainable solutions, maybe like the ones IARI teaches. What about traditional methods? 26/01 could be a day to start fresh. Saw some stuff on organic farming at 14:00 hrs on Krishi Darshan last 02/03/2023. Gotta balance yield with long-term health, na? Rs. 5000 crop gone due to pests!
